pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, August 23, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Prince George, British Columbia 

7:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with British Columbia Fire Protection Officer Tom Reinboldt.

Prince George Fire Centre
3740 Opie Crescent

Notes for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media should arrive no later than 6:45 a.m.

7:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with British Columbia emergency management staff and volunteers.

Prince George Fire Centre
3740 Opie Crescent

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 6:45 a.m.

Nanaimo, British Columbia

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Retreat.

Vancouver Island Conference Centre

Note for media:

    • Coverage of the Cabinet Retreat is open to accredited media only. If you have not obtained Cabinet Retreat accreditation in advance, please email media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca no later than 8:00 p.m. on August 22.

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Mount Benson Ballroom A
Vancouver Island Conference Centre

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for accredited media
    • Accredited media should arrive no later than 2:15 p.m.
